pageTitle: Saint Mary's College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {56958=Saint Mary's College is a beautiful all-women's Catholic college located across the street for Notre Dame University and next door to Holy Cross College. There are currently around 1600 students, so the class sizes are small and the professors know their students. The school provides many opportunities for the women, such as a variety of majors, a large network to aid in job applications, and a chance to take classes at the other two schools., 195529=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here South Bend is not the most exciting town to live in. Football weekends here seem to be the most fun. There are a lot of things to do off campus, you just have to try really hard to find stuff. I recommend going to ND to eat a few nights a week. You meet some cool people and therefore, you have more connections as to what to do on weekends. Am learning a lot Classes are tough, but to be honest, I learned more in the first year of college than I did my whole high school career. It is totally worth it!! Do not skip class a lot, especially math classes, because on the day you think you won't be doing anything special, it turns out to be the worst day in the world to skip! No joke. Login to rate or flag the reviews Allison from Battle Creek, MI 11/29/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 38
